overall_data.description: Monthly details of revenue, expenses and profit for each well.

columns.metric_month: Month for which costs and revenue of each well applies to. It has the value of first day of the month and applies to entire month.
columns.Net_Operating_Profit_to_WI_Owners: Profit made by the well for the corresponding month in metric_month column value
columns.Oil_Production_Tax: Oil production tax paid for the well for the corresponding month in metric_month column value
columns.Oil_Sales_Bbls: Number of barells of oil produced by the well for the corresponding month in metric_month column value
columns.Total_Revenue: Revenue made by the well for the corresponding month in metric_month column value
columns.Total_WI_Expenses: Total expenses for the well for the corresponding month in metric_month column value
columns.Workover_Cost: Workover costs for the well for the corresponding month in metric_month column value
columns.is_forecasted: Indicates whether the values are forecasted.

wells_dca.description: Decline curve analysis indicating economic limit of each well.

columns.initial_production: Month for which costs and revenue of each well applies to. It has the value of first day of the month and applies to entire month.
columns.decline_rate: Decline rate found from decline curve analysis using python
columns.dca_method: Indicates what type of decline curve analysis. possible values are Exponential, Hyperbolic or Harmonic.
columns.already_uneconomic: Indicates whether the well is already uneconomic. Economic limit for well is 75 barells per month
columns.is_uneconomic_in_2_years: Indicates whether the well will become uneconomic in 2 years
columns.month_number_if_becoming_uneconomic: Indicates the number of months from now when will the well become uneconomic

wells_dca_future_predictions.description: Forecasted production of each well month wise using decline curve analysis.

columns.metric_month: Month for which forecasted production of each well applies to. It has the value of first day of the month and applies to entire month.
columns.metric_value: Forecasted production using decline curve analysis

expenses_data.description: Monthly detailed expenses breakdown of each well.

columns.metric_month: Month for which costs and revenue of each well applies to. It has the value of first day of the month and applies to entire month.
columns.Administrative_Overhead: Administrative Overhead costs applicable for the well for the month of metric_month column value
columns.Chemical_Solvents: Chemical Solvents costs applicable for the well for the month of metric_month column value
columns.Computer_Monitoring: Computer Monitoring costs applicable for the well for the month of metric_month column value
columns.Electricity: Electricity costs applicable for the well for the month of metric_month column value
columns.Environmental_Expenses: Environmental Expenses costs applicable for the well for the month of metric_month column value
columns.Field_Direct_Payroll: Field Direct Payroll costs applicable for the well for the month of metric_month column value
columns.Field_Office_Expense: Field Office Expense costs applicable for the well for the month of metric_month column value
columns.Fuel_Power: Fuel Power costs applicable for the well for the month of metric_month column value
columns.Hauling: Hauling costs applicable for the well for the month of metric_month column value
columns.Land_Expense: Land Expense costs applicable for the well for the month of metric_month column value
columns.Lease_Crew_Maint: Lease Crew Maint costs applicable for the well for the month of metric_month column value
columns.Materials_Supplies: Materials Supplies costs applicable for the well for the month of metric_month column value
columns.Rentals: Rentals costs applicable for the well for the month of metric_month column value
columns.Repair_Maintenance: Repair Maintenance costs applicable for the well for the month of metric_month column value
columns.Surface_Payments: Surface Payments costs applicable for the well for the month of metric_month column value
columns.Total_WI_Expenses: Total Expenses of the well for the month of metric_month column value
columns.Vacuum_Truck: Vacuum Truck costs applicable for the well for the month of metric_month column value
columns.Vehicle_Expense: Vehicle Expense costs applicable for the well for the month of metric_month column value
columns.Workover_Cost: Workover Cost costs applicable for the well for the month of metric_month column value
